speaker: HECTOR
text_entry: SCENE VII. Another part of the plains.

speaker: HECTOR
text_entry: Enter ACHILLES, with Myrmidons

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Come here about me, you my Myrmidons;

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Mark what I say. Attend me where I wheel:

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Strike not a stroke, but keep yourselves in breath:

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: And when I have the bloody Hector found,

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Empale him with your weapons round about;

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: In fellest manner execute your aims.

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Follow me, sirs, and my proceedings eye:

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: It is decreed Hector the great must die.

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Exeunt

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Enter MENELAUS and PARIS, fighting: then THERSITES

speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: The cuckold and the cuckold-maker are at it. Now,

speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: bull! now, dog! 'Loo, Paris, 'loo! now my double-

speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: henned sparrow! 'loo, Paris, 'loo! The bull has the

speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: game: ware horns, ho!

speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: Exeunt PARIS and MENELAUS

speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: Enter MARGARELON

speaker: MARGARELON
text_entry: Turn, slave, and fight.

speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: What art thou?

speaker: MARGARELON
text_entry: A bastard son of Priam's.

speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: I am a bastard too; I love bastards: I am a bastard

speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: begot, bastard instructed, bastard in mind, bastard

speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: in valour, in every thing illegitimate. One bear will

speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: not bite another, and wherefore should one bastard?

speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: Take heed, the quarrel's most ominous to us: if the

speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: son of a whore fight for a whore, he tempts judgment:

speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: farewell, bastard.

speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: Exit

speaker: MARGARELON
text_entry: The devil take thee, coward!

speaker: MARGARELON
text_entry: Exit
